Aw Acr 70 anfenn TH Dasr Concruiarson OnntNance, BE it enacted by the Ferliamont of tho Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka as follows :—
1, This Act may be cited as the Debt Concillation Short title (Amondment) Act, No. 20 of 1983.

% Section 19a (inserted by Act No. § of 1959) of the Amedment Debt Coneiliation Ordinance (hereinafter referred to as the 284% | 4 principal enactment) is hereby amended, by the repeal of subsection (1) of that section, and the substitution therefor, of the following subsection :—~
“ (1) The Board shall not entertain any application by
a debtor or creditor in respect of a debt purporting to be
secured by any such conditional transfer of immovable
property so is a mortgage within the meaning of this
Ordinance unless that application is made before the
expity of the period within which that property may be
redeemed by the debtor by virtue of any legally
enforceable agreement between him and his creditor. ",

3 Section 64 of the principal enactment, as amended by Amendment Act No, 5 of 1959, is hereby further amended, by the substi- 4 of the tution, for the definition of “debtor”, of the following énactmeat definition :—
"debtor" means a person—
(@ who has crested a mortgage or charge over any immovable property or any part thereof and whose debts in respect of such property exceed the preserlbed amount ; of
(i) who is © tranferee of a right of redemption on a . conditional transfer,
and includes the heirs, executors and administrators gf
such person. * ,
